item.title: [issue-open]: `urls` file
item.author: accforgithubtest
item.content:encoded: Can you pls share the urls file used on the [demo site](https://konrad.website/liveboat-github-runner/#/).I am going thru the newsboat urls docs, yet having issues filtering reddit feed by age. Looks like there are useful examples in the urls file for the demo site that new users can use as reference. Thanks for your consideration !
